title: League crashes my computer
body: When i go to start the launcher for league my whole computer crashes and gives me a blue screen and an error saying UNEXPECTED_KERNEL_MODE_TRAP. This only happens on league, I can play other games. Thanks to anyone who is willing to help.

replies.body: This error message usually indicates that your OS settings may be preventing the patcher from launching.  When you have some time, go over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to grant access to the patcher so it can scan and access game files.  Hope that helps!
